alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 4:52AM PST until December 28 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, except 2 to 3 feet above 7000 feet. Wind gusts up to 45 mph. Sierra ridge gusts up to 100 mph. Widespread whiteout conditions. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. Roads and highways may be closed for extended periods of time.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
